ygData.subject: RE: More junky changes in last Patch that were NOT listed **Spoil er**
ygData.msgSnippet: oh another junk item that has been made no drop is the mystic dolls (+3 charisma) ooooh i would hate to twink someone with a +3 charisma doll. Think i ll just
ygData.messageBody:
oh another junk item that has been made no drop is the mystic dolls (+3
charisma)
ooooh i would hate to twink someone with a +3 charisma doll. Think
i'll just go kill hurd and give a newbie a +15 charisma stein instead of a
barbie doll that has +3.

Minkin
sol ro
Still pissed at his worthless box now
> .
> .
> .
> .
> Here are some additional changes which occured in the patch that were not
> announced. I know you all are probably getting
> petitions on alot of these so hopefully this information will allow you to
>
> inform players that it was a change and not a bug.
>
> If there are any others we may have missed please report them to your
> server
> GM so that we can verify that they were indeed
> intentional changes and not bugs.
>
> Thanks,
> Solist
>
> Normal arrows (item 8005)have had their range reduced from 50 to 25. This
> is
> because fletched arrows are range 50 and a
> flectcher making his own arrows should have better arrows than generic
> storebought ones. No other arrows were affected
>
> -The Box of Abu-Kar has had the it's weight reduction greatly reduced.
> (don't have exact reduction specs)
>
> -The item Glowing Stein has been changed to Stein of Moggok
>
> -The Lustrous Russet Armor is now warrior only, a previous error had
> caused
> it to be used by several other classes despite the
> fact it was always intented to be warrior only
>
> -The Fletching kit now has 8 slots. This is to allow more items added into
>
> the process to make new bows.
>
> -New tailoring items have been added. Tailors can now make the silk series
>
> of armor. The books on how to manufacture these
> are also in the game, but are spawn drops and not vendor sales.
>
> -Vendors who previously sold just arrow nocks now sell all of the
> fletching
> materials.
>
> Reported by a Player (Remf the Troll)
>
> -nobles crests from the npc paladins in swamp are nodrop now
> -kolandi fish now nodrop
> -erud tonic now nodrop
> -honeyjum now require high faction to acquire
> -egg shaped pumice now casts dispel magic instead of pillage enchantment
> -monster frenzy AI tweaked
> -crafted armor now sells to vendor for 10x lower prices
>
> "bugs"
> -fishies still swim in the air
> -items dropped on ground become permanent fixtures, at least client side
> -teleporting monsters play leapfrog when the appear, keep jumping on top
> of
> you
> -new arrow range overrides bow rating (25 arrow + 150 bow = 25 arrow range
>
> :/
>
>
> Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server
> Master Craftsmen of Societus Argenti
>
